name: Breakfall (I - II)
content:
Description

You are as graceful as a swan. Like the martial artists and swashbucklers of legendary tales, your agility enables you to fall from deadly heights unharmed.

Effect

You gain benefits according to your tier in this feat.
  • Tier 1 - As long as you are conscious and able to act, reduce all falling damage by half.
  • Tier 2 - As long as you are conscious and able to act, you do not suffer falling damage.

data.description: You are as graceful as a swan. Like the martial artists and swashbucklers of legendary tales, your agility enables you to fall from deadly heights unharmed.
